job description:
Are you interested in getting experience in an exciting fast-paced Internet of Things company? Do you enjoy learning and growing within an innovative organization that encourages collaboration and team building across all levels of the company? Are you customer-focused and driven to solve problems? If so, come join our team as a Machine Learning Engineer Intern!

KCF Technologies is looking to hire an intern (about 15 hours a week) for the fall semester. If you are an in a computer engineering, IST, or electrical engineering program and have taken courses in data science, please apply now!

Requirements

Requirements for the Machine Learning Engineer Intern include:
  • Junior or Senior in a Data Sciences Bachelor’s degree program
  • Familiarity with Python
  • Willingness to learn and flexible attitude
  • Understanding of neural networks and other machine learning concepts
  • Ability to be located in State College, PA area
  • Proof of US Citizenship
Benefits

KCF Technologies' products are providing huge cost reductions and saving industrial manufacturing jobs all over the United States. If you value meaningful professional experience, autonomy, sense of purpose, borrowing a KCF bike for a lunchtime ride, and having fun with a family of similar experts, this is the home for you. Apply for our Machine Learning Engineer Intern position today!
